about.name: Nashville
about.info_text: Nashville, often referred to as 'Music City,' is the capital of Tennessee and a vibrant hub of country music and entertainment. Known for its live music venues, historic landmarks, and Southern hospitality, Nashville offers a unique blend of culture, cuisine, and musical heritage. Whether you're exploring the iconic Grand Ole Opry, indulging in hot chicken, or strolling along the lively streets of Broadway, Nashville has a lot to offer.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 700,000
State: Tennessee
Time Zone: Central Time Zone (UTC-06:00)
Languages: English
Currency: United States Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Nashville experiences a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters. It's an ideal year-round destination for music enthusiasts and travelers looking to enjoy its rich cultural scene.

attractions_card.title: Grand Ole Opry
attractions_card.description: The Grand Ole Opry is a historic and legendary venue where country music stars have performed for decades. It's a must-visit for music enthusiasts.

attractions_card.alt: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
attractions_card.title: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
attractions_card.description: The Country Music Hall of Fame showcases the history and heritage of country music through exhibits, artifacts, and live performances.

attractions_card.title: Ryman Auditorium
attractions_card.description: The Ryman Auditorium, known as the 'Mother Church of Country Music,' is a historic venue with incredible acoustics and a rich musical legacy.

attractions_card.title: Broadway Honky Tonks
attractions_card.description: Broadway in downtown Nashville is lined with honky tonks and live music venues, offering a lively atmosphere and constant entertainment.

attractions_card.title: The Parthenon
attractions_card.description: A full-scale replica of the Parthenon in Athens, this iconic landmark in Centennial Park features art exhibitions and a stunning statue of Athena.

attractions_card.title: Belle Meade Plantation
attractions_card.description: Belle Meade Plantation is a historic estate with a mansion and gardens, providing insights into Nashville's antebellum past.

attractions_card.title: The Johnny Cash Museum
attractions_card.description: Dedicated to the legendary Johnny Cash, this museum features memorabilia, exhibits, and an extensive collection of artifacts from his life and career.

attractions_card.title: Nashville Zoo at Grassmere
attractions_card.description: The Nashville Zoo offers a family-friendly experience with a wide variety of animals, interactive exhibits, and conservation programs.

food_card.title: Hot Chicken
food_card.description: Nashville is famous for its hot chicken, a spicy fried chicken dish that's a local specialty. Try it at various restaurants in the city.

food_card.title: Biscuits and Gravy
food_card.description: Biscuits and gravy is a Southern classic, featuring fluffy biscuits smothered in creamy sausage gravy, often served for breakfast.

food_card.title: Barbecue
food_card.description: Nashville boasts a thriving barbecue scene with a variety of styles, from pulled pork to ribs, served with flavorful sauces.

food_card.title: Goo Goo Cluster
food_card.description: Goo Goo Cluster is a beloved Nashville candy, featuring nougat, caramel, peanuts, and milk chocolate. Don't miss this sweet treat.

food_card.title: Meat and Three
food_card.description: Meat and three restaurants allow you to choose a meat and three side dishes, a classic Southern comfort food tradition.

hotels_card.title: The Hermitage Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Hermitage Hotel is a luxurious and historic hotel in downtown Nashville, offering elegant rooms, fine dining, and a timeless atmosphere.

hotels_card.title: Omni Nashville Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Omni Nashville Hotel is connected to the Country Music Hall of Fame and provides modern accommodations with a rooftop pool and bar.

hotels_card.title: Gaylord Opryland Resort & Convention Center
hotels_card.description: This sprawling resort near the Grand Ole Opry features lush gardens, indoor waterfalls, multiple restaurants, and extensive event spaces.

hotels_card.title: The Westin Nashville
hotels_card.description: The Westin Nashville offers contemporary rooms and a rooftop bar with panoramic views of the city's skyline.

hotels_card.title: Noelle Nashville
hotels_card.description: Noelle Nashville is a stylish boutique hotel with unique design, culinary options, and a rooftop bar in the heart of downtown.

hotels_card.title: Thompson Nashville
hotels_card.description: The Thompson Nashville is a boutique hotel in the Gulch district, known for its chic design, upscale dining, and lively ambiance.

hotels_card.alt: The Joseph, a Luxury Collection Hotel
hotels_card.title: The Joseph, a Luxury Collection Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Joseph is an art-filled luxury hotel with contemporary elegance, offering a refined experience in the city's Art District.

hotels_card.title: Hutton Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Hutton Hotel combines music, art, and hospitality, featuring stylish rooms, creative dining, and a focus on Nashville's cultural scene.

transport_card.title: Nashville International Airport
transport_card.description: Nashville International Airport (BNA) is the major airport serving the city, providing connections to domestic and international destinations.

transport_card.title: Music City Star Commuter Train
transport_card.description: The Music City Star commuter train connects Nashville to nearby communities, making it convenient for commuters and visitors.

transport_card.title: WeGo Public Transit
transport_card.description: WeGo Public Transit offers bus services throughout Nashville, providing an affordable way to explore the city and its neighborhoods.

transport_card.title: Taxis and Ridesharing
transport_card.description: Taxis, Uber, and Lyft services are available for convenient transportation within Nashville and its surrounding areas.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Car rental agencies in Nashville offer flexibility for travelers to explore the city and nearby attractions at their own pace.
